ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound sweet potatoes, cut into long, thin rectangles
1 large carrot, cut into long, thin rectangles
1 parsnip, cut into long, thin rectangles
extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed

salt and ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Julienne or matchstick cut vegetables for quick, even cooking and caramelization
